remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件可讓您透過 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 服務驗證使用者。The object enables you to authenticate users through a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) service. 您必須驗證的使用者可透過從外部儲存使用者認證的 Web 應用程式的應用程式的 ASP.NET 成員資格時，您可以使用 WCF 驗證服務。You use the WCF authentication service when you must authenticate users through ASP.NET membership from an application that is outside the Web application that stores the user credentials. 應用程式必須能夠傳送和使用 SOAP 格式的訊息。The application must be able to send and consume message in the SOAP format. 透過類別，您可以記錄使用者、 記錄使用者 out、 驗證認證、 檢查驗證狀態、 自訂驗證，以及設定驗證 cookie。Through the class, you can log users in, log users out, validate credentials, check authentication status, customize authentication, and set the authentication cookie. 類別包含您應該只透過 WCF 服務存取的四種方法： ， ， ，和方法。The class contains four methods that you should access only through a WCF service: the , , , and methods. 若要呼叫這些方法，您啟用網頁伺服器上的驗證服務，然後再連接到 Web 服務相容的 WCF 用戶端應用程式。To call these methods, you enable the authentication service on a Web server and then connect a WCF-compatible client application to the Web service. 如需如何設定驗證服務的資訊，請參閱[How to： 啟用 WCF 驗證服務](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f7913259-762e-4a73-a771-ac9e42903f44)。For information about how to configure the authentication service, see [How to: Enable the WCF Authentication Service](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f7913259-762e-4a73-a771-ac9e42903f44). 若要登入的使用者，您將傳遞使用者認證，方法。To log users on, you pass the user credentials to the method. 如果認證有效，類別會建立驗證 cookie。If the credentials are valid, the class creates an authentication cookie. 如果驗證 cookie 尚未過期，您必須知道已驗證使用者的認證，而您又沒有重新驗證認證。If the authentication cookie has not expired, you know that the user's credentials have been authenticated and you do not have to validate the credentials again. (無 cookie 驗證不是可透過類別。)(Cookie-less authentication is not available through the class.) 可能會引發兩個事件：和。The can raise two events: and . 正在驗證的使用者認證時，就會發生事件。The event occurs when the user credentials are being validated. 建立事件處理常式事件，以自訂方式會驗證使用者認證。Create an event handler for the event to customize how user credentials are validated. 驗證 cookie 已設定在驗證使用者認證之後，就會發生事件。The event occurs when the authentication cookie is being set after user credentials have been validated. 建立事件處理常式事件，以自訂驗證 cookie。Create an event handler for the event to customize the authentication cookie. 方法會檢查使用者認證進行驗證，但它不會傳回驗證票證。The method checks user credentials for authentication, but it does not return an authentication ticket. 使用當使用者先前已登入，而且您必須檢查認證是否仍然有效，在新的應用程式工作階段的開始。Use when a user has previously logged in and you must check that the credentials are still valid at the start of a new application session. 如需使用 WCF 驗證服務，從主控台應用程式的範例，請參閱[逐步解說： 使用 ASP.NET 應用程式服務](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3f394f0-20d6-4361-aa8f-4b21bf4933eb)。For an example of using the WCF authentication service from a console application, see [Walkthrough: Using ASP.NET Application Services](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3f394f0-20d6-4361-aa8f-4b21bf4933eb).
